title: About Me
body: ![This was taken during fall 2015.][1] I am Principal Technical Consultant for Private and Public cloud and a Microsoft Azure MVP. I am passionate about technology and how it can change the way we experience life. ### My Moto >Do it with Passion or Not at all! ### Technologies I focus on Various technologies which I focus on, but not limited to, are: * Microsoft Azure & AWS Cloud Platforms * Automation in Azure * ARM Templates Development * DevOps * PowerShell Scripting * System Center Products - esp. Orchestrator, Virtual Machine Manager, Service Manager, etc. * Application Insights * Visual Studio, Git, GitHub, TFS & Release Management * Dot Net Application development (esp. Web using MVC) * Windows Azure Pack (WAP) * Service Management Automation (SMA) ### What I have been doing I have been working with great companies like Infosys (2.5 yrs), Microsoft (5 yrs) & Green House Data(current) previously known as Infront Consulting Group. I have been working on various Microsoft products from within or outside of Microsoft, working closely with their product teams. I have been busy building enterprise solutions around: * Azure Billing & Chargeback * Enterprise Datacenter Management solutions * System Center customization solutions * Windows Azure Pack customizations and resource providers Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to contact me on social media or on my email id at [20aman@gmail.com](mailto:20aman@gmail.com?subject=HarvestingClouds). You can connect with me on Twitter @20aman. You can also find me on Linked In. Thanks for stopping by! [1]: http://HarvestingClouds.com/images/14617319815720428d47326.png
